tools

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.Weapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerWeapon

    public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the weapons in the Epic Monsterslayer Game. Give constructor ("Name" max damage and minimum damage).
    Version:
    1,0
    Author:
    Henrik Hagstr√∂m

      • getMinDmg

        public int getMinDmg()

        Returns:

      • getDmg

        public int getDmg()
        Generates a random number for weapon.
        Returns:
        the random number generated between max damage and min damage. Remember this is the damage for weapon only, Player strength is added later. If the generated number is equal to max number plus min number, aka highest posible outcome, the dmg is doubled. It is only the weapon damage that is doubled, and not the total Player damage.
